message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to purchase this incredible product with you. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I believe will bring immense value to your life. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a great deal, considering its true value is well over $1000000. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, my budget allows me to spend up to $850000 on this item. I would like to make a counteroffer at this price.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're working within a budget, but I'm still confident that this product is worth more than $850000. Considering your interest in the product, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $875000. This is a fair price, considering the product's value and the benefits it will bring to you. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $860000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm glad to see that we're getting closer to a mutually agreeable price. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $860000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm counteroffering at $880000. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value and my own needs. What do you think?

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I've reviewed the situation and am willing to pay $870000 for the product. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between our positions and I hope you find it acceptable.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not convinced that $870000 is a fair price for this product. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm counteroffering at $890000. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value and my own needs. What do you think?

I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $880000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement.
